name: Leap Frog
description:
Leap to Victory!

A "Fighting" game for up to 4 players. Control frogs by only jumping and nothing else! Attack by jumping on other players. Collect powerups to level the odds.

Controls
  • P1: W
  • P2: I
  • P3: Up Arrow
  • P4: Numpad 8
Credits BGM
  • Ludum Dare 38 - Track 6, VGMA Challenge - July 29th by Abstraction (http://www.abstractionmusic.com/)
  • Can't Stop Winning by Jonathan Shaw (jshaw.co.uk)
SFX
  • RPG Essentials SFX (Water 02) by Leohpaz
  • Sound effects Pack 2 by Swiss Arcade Game Entertainment
  • The "GIGA-PACK" Sounds (player land) by clonethirteen
  • UI menu sounds by SoupTonic
Font
  • Kitto Katto by Helotype (www.1001fonts.com/users/yrcreate/)
